questions.question: Fizzbuzz: if x is a multiple of 3, print fizz, if x is a multiple of 5, print buzz, if x is a multiple of 3 and 5, print fizzbuzz.
OddSum EvenDivide: there are 2 variables, a and b. If a is odd, then return the sum of a and b. If a is even, then return the quotient of a to b
OddSubtract EvenMultiply: there are 2 variables, a and b. If a is odd, then return the difference between a and b. If a is even, then return the product of a and b
